Translations.Text: ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu katilu-llezine yelunekum mine-lkuffari velyecidu fikum gilzah. va`lemu enne-llahe me`a-lmuttekin
veiza ma unzilet suratun feminhum mey yekulu eyyukum zadethu hazihi imana. feemme-llezine amenu fezadethum imanev vehum yestebsirun
veemme-llezine fi kulubihim meradun fezadethum ricsen ila ricsihim vematu vehum kafirun
evela yeravne ennehum yuftenune fi kulli `amim merraten ev merrateyni summe la yetubune vela hum yezzekkerun
veiza ma unzilet suratun nezara ba`duhum ila ba`d. hel yerakum min ehadin summe-nsarafu. sarafe-llahu kulubehum biennehum kavmul la yefkahun
lekad caekum rasulum min enfusikum `aziz. `aleyhi ma `anittum harisun `aleykum bilmu'minine raufur rahim
fein tevellev fekul hasbiye-llah. la ilahe illa hu. `aleyhi tevekkeltu vehuve rabbu-l`arsi-l`azim
